definition: bad record (esp. of a public official)/unsavory track record

sentences.english: I shall never attempt to palliate my own foible by exposing the error of another .
sentences.chinese: 你不能用別人的惡行來掩飾自己的劣跡。

sentences.english: After the incident, Lee also directs others Perjury up their own misdeeds .
sentences.chinese: 事發後，李英還指使他人作僞證包庇自己的劣跡。

sentences.english: The year 2012 is acting like a badly behaved celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 2012這個年份正像一個劣跡斑斑的名人。

sentences.english: Police data show that Germann is a notorious record of drug addicts and the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 警方數據顯示，格爾曼是個無業和劣跡斑斑的癮君子。

sentences.english: Many instances of cruelty and inhumanity can be found on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 其實交戰雙方皆有許多殘酷無情的劣跡。

sentences.english: Today I shed my old skin which hath , too long , suffered the bruises of failure and wounds of mediocrity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我爬出滿是失敗創傷和平庸劣跡的老繭。
